name: Jardin Secret 2 Deluxe
description:
Fed up by the last 12 Match-3 games you played? Looking for a bit of freshness for your morning commute, to shorten up your medical visits or your 4 hours of morning study?
Jardin Secret 2 Deluxe is the end of the never-ending monotony of match-3 games; hop in a crazy adventure through 100 levels to discover. Forget about those candy-filled match-3 clones, and experience the many hours of fun of an arcade title with fresh & addicting gameplay.

- No stress, Jardin Secret 2 Deluxe can be played anywhere, without time limit
- At least 43 medical visits (or 120h of morning study, or 231 days or traffic jams) of game time with the 6 worlds to discover and 100+ hand-made, love-filled levels
- That many gameplay twists to discover (twin seeds, blocking blocks, bonus powers, scary objectives…)
- An ever-renewing challenge with stars, elite & platinum levels
- 0 in-app purchase, no life-system or time limit. Guaranteed without hidden defects.

Burst open a seed and gaze at the chain reactions that will send your device to a number of crazy adventures through 100+ hand-made levels (and we’re working on more!). Forget about the usual routine with the new worlds and their breathtaking visuals in Jardin Secret 2 Deluxe, an addicting game full of qualities and selling points (that’s what Marketing guys say, don’t quote us on that).

To try it is to fall in love with it. 100% without ads, without gluten, and without Paraben.
